alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Calhoun; Greene; Jersey; Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 1:32PM CST until January 22 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations between one tenth and two tenths of an inch. A burst of sleet overnight may produce light sleet accumulations. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Illinois and central, east central, northeast, and southeast Missouri. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. In Illinois, the latest road conditions can be obtained at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. In Missouri, the latest road conditions can be obtained at traveler.modot.org/map or by calling 1-888-275-6636.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Brown; Calhoun; Greene; Jersey; Pike
